messages.subject: Punk, was; music and strewing
messages.msgSnippet: (Iggy Pop and the Stooges was mentioned on a couple of pages and Iggy had a connection to Bowie.) Yeah, Bowie was a huge influence on Iggy and saved him from
messages.messageBody:
"(Iggy Pop and the
Stooges was mentioned on a couple of pages and Iggy had a connection
to
Bowie.)"

Yeah, Bowie was a huge influence on Iggy and saved him from
destroying his life with drugs. Basically jump started his career.

I used to say that Bowie was punk before there was such a word. He
wasn't punk as far as the movement went, but he was doing things so
far ahead of his time that he was really one of the influencing
factors I believe.

Ren
